index.desc:
This is the website dedicated to a company named Kocka-Systems.
Kocka-Systems server is a gift from dilFa Communicatons AS, one small, but very successful company from Norway.
index.desc2: His administrators are very young people, that want to enter the world of new things of informatics and technology.

forum.desc1: Here you discuss about Kocka-Systems products.
forum.desc2: Here you discuss about Kocka-Systems service.
forum.desc4: If you have some problems, report them here!

kontakt.contactHeader: Our emloyees you can contact on :
kontakt.formDesc: If you like something in Kocka-Systems (or you don't like something), don't hesitate to say that to us through this contact form! Just enter your name, surname and e-mail, and expect a fast answer!

beta-index.p:
Beta testing group is a group of people that is testing, and then submits usage reports.
Kocka-Systems decided to give users a chance to beta-test current versions of their games, and in return give them a discount on the games.
If you want to join, contact us through the contact form

profile-login.desc:
This is a place where you can login to the site to get access to the forum, store....
If you are not registered, register here.

profile-register.p:
Here, you can register to the site.
When you register, you get access to the Kocka-Systems store, forum and many more things!
profile-register.numberpic: Enter the code from the image :

profile-index.p:
This is your profile.
With it you can buy our products.
profile-index.changepass1: If you want to change the password :
profile-index.usersListDesc: This is the list of registered users.

store-index.desc:
Here you can order Kocka-Systems products.
There are these products :

games-index.desc:
Here you can play Kocka-Systems online games.
Requirements : Adobe Flash Player 10 and web-browser that is not Internet Explorer.
WARNING: Game may in future have flashes which are very dangerous if you periodically have
epileptic attacks. Also, we may add audio, so we suggest night people to mute speakers or use headphones.

minecraft-index.desc:
Kocka-Systems Minecraft server has started as organizations entertainment system,
and has a white-list to friends of server administrators.

worker-index.desc1:
Kocka-Systems, project started by young people from {location stripped} is making and selling games.
It's made for young people to earn some money, but also some of that money goes to charity.
worker-index.desc2: Kocka-Systems project was started by {name stripped} in november 2013. with name Goldenson.
worker-index.desc3: Here you can find Kocka-Systems employees' private pages.

rpg-scripts-index.intro-text: Hello! Welcome to the KOCKA-Script index! Here, you can find all of the KOCKA scripts, read the terms, and give some feedback! KOCKA-Scripts are made by KockaAdmiralac
